comments_since_last_sample.body: Good old auntie (BBC) Another long winded, boring report .Totally out of touch with normal people and their problems.

As far as I'm aware they're not doing anything to stop climate change. That would be a great start for Arab nations who are some of the biggest polluters. We can't live in this small mind where the world is a couple thousand years old and Allah will take care of everything. Sadly this is the mindset of many. No hate, but if we wanna survive as a species we all need to step up and become far more evolved and aware.
